name: Shield Shock
description:
Shield Shock is a 2D Platform Fighter Game all about blocking! Use your shield to block enemy projectiles and release mighty attacks right back! This 4-Player Party Fighting Game will offer players the chance to fight against friends with more modes coming in future development.

Modes in the Full Version:
- Stock Mode - Fight Till One Player Is Left
- Party Mode - Battle Until The Timer Runs Out, Player With The Most Points Wins!
- Survival Mode - Fight Alongside Companions Destroying The Onslaught Of Blockers That Stand In Your Way

- Story/Arcade Mode - Compete In Waves Of Competition, Proving Your Worth In The Trials of Shield Shock.
